topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543e655963687229c2010400#post_543e655963687229c2010400
They say whatever's depicted in dreams has the opposite effect in real life. Scientifically speaking, dreams cannot predict the future. They can only draw from existing memories. So all the people there, all mangled, pulped up and twisted in many ways; Yeah, you've seen them before. And for your mind to generate such imagery... says a lot about your mental standing.

Who am I to judge? I once dreamed about eating a cow whilst it's still alive.
